original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3381)@</color>放下所有理智，瘋狂的對面前的敵人做出五次重擊，每次以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3381)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3381)@</color> put down all your sanity, frantically make five heavy blows to the enemy in front of you, each time Use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3381)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> to cause physical damage to the enemy.
